result.title: What is wrong with my code (Range query problem)
result.content:
I've been working on Problem C from UM 2017 Practice Contest 2 (see Long Journey: https://icpcgate.org/contest/problems.php?cid=87), and when I submit my code for Long Journey--Hard, it gives me a runtime error in the second test case (my code passed for Long Journey--Easy).

Can any bright-minded competitive programmers tell what's wrong with my code? You can view the code here: https://pastebin.com/UhBqNVEA (I used a segment tree).

Feel free to comment if you need any clarifications about my code.
